name: Glassboard Workspace View
description: A dashboard-style interface leveraging glassmorphism for a modern, airy feel, ideal for collaborative workspaces.

atoms.name: Glass Card
atoms.description: White card with rounded corners and subtle glassmorphism effect.
atoms.css: background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7); border-radius: 24px; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px); box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.04);

atoms.name: Pill Button
atoms.description: Small, rounded button used for navigation or actions.
atoms.css: border-radius: 9999px; padding: 8px 16px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; color: #212121; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.04); border: none; cursor: pointer;

atoms.name: Circular Avatar
atoms.description: Circular image used to represent a user.

code.css: .glass-card { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7); border-radius: 24px; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px); box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.04); padding: 16px; } .pill-button { border-radius: 9999px; padding: 8px 16px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; color: #212121; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.04); border: none; cursor: pointer; }
code.tailwind: Not applicable, requires backdrop-filter which is not directly supported in Tailwind without plugins.

best_for: Lightweight interfaces with a modern aesthetic
Applications where visual clarity is important
UIs that benefit from a sense of depth
avoid_for: Situations where accessibility is paramount (glassmorphism can reduce contrast)
Applications requiring a very technical or serious tone
Legacy browsers that don't support backdrop-filter
